name: Shopp + Video Tutorials
author: Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC

sections.description:
This plugin provides video tutorials and online lessons for the Shopp e-commerce plugin.

Recommendations

  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp developer today.
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
  • Follow Lorenzo on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Quora, and Github

Acknowledgements

Thanks to the members of the Shopp support team for feedback on this plugin.

Recommended Links

Need a Shopp developer to help you with your Shopp? Hire a Shopp consultant and developer today.

What do you think about video tutorials for Shopp? Web-based lessons and tutorial videos from Shopp 101
sections.installation:
1. Ensure that your Shopp is activated and up-to-date.
  2. Download Shopp + Video Tutorials. Unzip the shopp-video-tutorials folder.
  3. Upload the shopp-video-tutorials folder to the wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate Shopp + Video Tutorials through the Plugins menu in the WordPress admin.
  5. Go to Shopp 101 → + Video Tutorials.
sections.faq:
What is Shopp and how do I get it?

Shopp is an ecommerce plugin for WordPress. Learn more about Shopp.

Are there any other extensions available for Shopp?

Yes, there are different extensions available including emailing marketing, short message service (sms) notifications, forms & reporting, help desk, and more. Please visit Shopp 101.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Changed name of menu from + Extensions to Shopp 101
  • Verified support for WP 3.9.2
  • Verified support for Shopp 1.3.5
  • Removed links to old domain name
  • Only load CSS on WP admin screen

1.2

  • Moved to new menu

1.0.2

  • New video: How to reinstall the Shopp core
  • New video: How to setup Shopp content templates

1.0.1

  • Relocated videos on Vimeo
  • Added additional tutorials for Shopp

1.0

  • First version of Shopp + Video Tutorials
